name: Double Axel PTE. LTD.
description: Developer of a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) travel technology designed to solve complex problems. The company's technology uses artificial intelligence and machine learning capabilities to offer internet booking engines and travel content, enabling companies to overcome the many challenges of accommodation distribution, increase speed to market and maximize profit from each sale.
one_liner: Developer of a Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) travel technology designed to solve complex problems. The company's technology uses artificial intelligence and machine learning capabilities to offer internet booking engines and travel content, enabling companies to overcome the many challenges of accommodation distribution, increase speed to market and maximize profit from each sale.
